full_summary:
## System Integration and Digital Support Services (TBIPS) (SPICT) Solicitation

**Solicitation Number:** 21120-227032/A
**Publication Date:** April 28, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** June 7, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Summary:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada’s (PWGSC) Correctional Service of Canada requires TBIPS services under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method. The successful bidder will provide system integration and digital support services to manage and integrate the new Offender Management System (OMS) into the CSC technical environment. The services will include the implementation of an extended digital-ready architecture in support of the transformation of the offender management business.

**Trade Agreement:**

This solicitation is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other trade agreements.

**Eligibility:**

Only TBIPS SA Holders holding a TBIPS SA for Tier 2 at the time of bid closing, in all required resource categories in this solicitation and in the National Capital Region, are eligible to compete.

**Services to be Provided:**

The services to be provided include:

* System integration and digital support services to manage and integrate the OMS into the CSC technical environment
* Implementation of an extended digital-ready architecture in support of the transformation of the offender management business
* Provision of TBIPS services in the following resource categories:
	+ Application/Software Architect
	+ Programmer/Software Developer
	+ Programmer/Analyst
	+ System Analyst
	+ Tester
	+ Data Conversion Specialist
	+ Database Administrator
	+ Database Modeler/Information Management Modeler
	+ Information Management Architect
	+ Network Analyst
	+ Technical Architect
	+ Technology Architect
	+ Business Analyst
	+ Business Architect
	+ Business Consultant
	+ Business Transformation Architect
	+ Courseware Developer
	+ Operations Support Specialist
	+ Technical Writer
	+ Change Management Consultant
	+ Enterprise Architect
	+ Project Executive
	+ Project Coordinator
	+ Project Manager
	+ Project Scheduler
	+ Quality Assurance Specialist/Analyst

**Tender Requirements:**

* Bidders must submit a written bid in accordance with the requirements outlined in this solicitation.
*
